Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:01.99]If I could write you a song to make you fall in love
[00:05.82]I would already have you up under my arm
[00:09.45]I used up all of my tricks, I hope that you like this
[00:13.04]But you probably won't, you think you're cooler than me
[00:17.02]You got designer shades just to hide your face
[00:21.05]And you wear 'em around like you're cooler than me
[00:24.83]And you never say hey or remember my name
[00:29.01]And it's probably cause you think you're cooler than me
[00:32.39]
[00:48.83]You got your high brow, shoes on your feet
[00:52.61]And you wear 'em around like it ain't shit
[00:56.44]But you don't know the way that you look
[01:00.17]When your steps make that much noise, shh
[01:04.50]See, I got you all figured out
[01:07.99]You need everyone's eyes just to feel seen
[01:12.12]Behind you make up nobody knows who you even are
[01:18.74]Who do you think that you are?
[01:20.38]
[01:20.58]If I could write you a song to make you fall in love
[01:24.48]I would already have you up under my arm
[01:28.01]I used up all of my tricks, I hope that you like this
[01:31.74]But, you probably won't, you think you're cooler than me
[01:35.63]You got designer shades just to hide your face
[01:39.69]And you wear 'em around like you're cooler than me
[01:43.47]And you never say hey or remember my name
[01:47.60]And it's probably cause you think you're cooler than me
[01:50.98]
[02:25.35]'Cause it sure seems ('cause it sure seems)
[02:28.70]You got no doubts (that you got no doubts)
[02:33.08]But we all see (we all see)
[02:36.21]You got your head in the clouds
[02:39.70]If I could write you a song
[02:40.75]And make you fall in love
[02:43.18]I would already have you up under my arm.
[02:46.92]I used up all of my tricks,
[02:48.66]I hope that you like this.
[02:50.50]But you probably won't.
[02:52.54]You think you're cooler than me.
[02:54.24]
[02:54.49]You got designer shades,
[02:56.58]Just to hide your face
[02:58.52]And you wear them around like you're cooler than me.
[03:02.26]And you never say "Hey"
[03:04.40]Or remember my name.
[03:06.58]It's probably 'cause you think you're cooler than me.
